This technique allows the user to camouflage themselves with the earth around and move freely through earth surfaces undetected. 

== Trivia ==
* This technique's name is the same as [[Iwagakure]]'s.
* This technique is used by [[Konohagakure]] [[Anbu]] members.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 50</ref>
